thread.section_title: LOLA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LOLA | mylola.com
thread.title: RaeAna

author: RaeAna
title: RaeAna
text: Lola is a great option for women looking for alternative all-natural, chemical free feminine care products. I have tried multiple all-natural products, even the Diva Cup, and nothing compares to Lola. They are just like normal pads, and tampons, but without the harsh chemicals! The best thing is having them delivered straight to my door. Also, having the customizable boxes limits wasting large boxes of things I don't need with other brands.
